welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mentor, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flight.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ashtabula Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a small terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
